import { useState } from "react"; import "../styles/Auth.css"; const Auth = () => { const [isSignup, setIsSignup] = useState(false); const [role, setRole] = useState(""); // فارغة → يظهر placeholder return (
{/* صورة الخلفية */}
{/* كرت اليسار */}
{!isSignup ? ( <>

Welcome

) : ( <>

Create Account

Create your account to start monitoring

)}
{/* كرت اليمين */}
{!isSignup ? ( <>

Login

Don’t have an account? setIsSignup(true)}> Create account

) : ( <>

Already have an account? setIsSignup(false)}> Login

)}
); }; export default Auth;
